name: SmolMuseum
description: Contract for handling the NFT staking and set creation.

functionDecorators.name: addCardSet
functionDecorators.description: Adds a card set with the input param configs. Removes an existing set if the id exists.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyUnstakeAllCards
functionDecorators.description: Emergency unstake the cards on providing the card IDs, forfeiting the TING rewards.

functionDecorators.name: getBoosterForUser
functionDecorators.description: Returns the applicable booster of a user, for a pool, from a staked NFT set.

functionDecorators.name: getCardIdListOfSet
functionDecorators.description: Returns the list of cardIds which are part of a set.

functionDecorators.name: getCardsStakedOfAddress
functionDecorators.description: Indexed boolean for whether a card is staked or not. Index represents the cardId.

functionDecorators.name: getFullSetsOfAddress
functionDecorators.description: Indexed boolean of each setId for which a user has a full set or not.

functionDecorators.name: getNumOfNftsStakedByAddress
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total amount of NFTs staked by an address across all sets.

functionDecorators.name: getNumOfNftsStakedForSet
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of NFTs staked by an address for a given set.

functionDecorators.name: harvest
functionDecorators.description: Harvests the accumulated TING in the contract, for the caller.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155BatchReceived
functionDecorators.description: Handle the receipt of multiple ERC1155 token types. An ERC1155-compliant smart contract MUST call this function on the token recipient contract, at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer Return of other amount than the magic value WILL result in the transaction being reverted Note: The token contract address is always the message sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _operator
parameterDecorators.description: The address which called the `safeBatchTransferFrom` function.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: _ids
parameterDecorators.description: An array containing ids of each token being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data with no specified format.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155Received
functionDecorators.description: Handle the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. An ERC1155-compliant smart contract MUST call this function on the token recipient contract, at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer Return of other amount than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted Note: The token contract address is always the message sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _operator
parameterDecorators.description: The address which called the `safeTransferFrom` function.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the token being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data with no specified format.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeCardSet
functionDecorators.description: Remove a cardSet that has been added. !!! Warning : if a booster set is removed, users with the booster staked will continue to benefit from the multiplier !!!.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setBonusTingMultiplierOfSets
functionDecorators.description: Set the bonusTingMultiplier value for a list of Card sets.

functionDecorators.name: setHighestCardId
functionDecorators.description: Manually sets the highestCardId, if it goes out of sync. Required calculate the range for iterating the list of staked cards for an address.

functionDecorators.name: setTingRateOfSets
functionDecorators.description: Updates the tingPerDayPerCard for a card set.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Stakes the cards on providing the card IDs.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: Indicates whether a contract implements the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` functions and so can accept ERC1155 token types. This function MUST return true if it implements the ERC1155TokenReceiver interface and ERC-165 interface. This function MUST NOT consume more than 5,000 gas.

parameterDecorators.name: interfaceID
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC-165 interface ID that is queried for support.s.

returnDecorators.description: Wheter ERC-165 or ERC1155TokenReceiver interfaces are supported.

functionDecorators.name: totalPendingTingOfAddress
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total ting pending for a given address. Can include the bonus from TingBooster, if second param is set to true.

functionDecorators.name: totalPendingTingOfAddressFromBooster
functionDecorators.description: Returns the pending ting coming from the bonus generated by TingBooster.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: treasury
functionDecorators.description: Update treasury address by the previous treasury.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Unstakes the cards on providing the card IDs.

functionDecorators.name: updateTingBoosterAddress
functionDecorators.description: Update TingBooster contract address linked to smolMuseum.
